verses.verse: "Then it shall be, when <WH3588> you enter <WH935> the land <WH776> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you as an inheritance, <WH5159> and you possess <WH3423> it and live <WH3427> in it,

that you shall take <WH3947> some <WH4480> of the first <WH7225> of all <WH3605> the produce <WH6529> of the ground <WH127> which <WH834> you shall bring <WH935> in from your land <WH776> that the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you, and you shall put <WH7760> [it] in a basket <WH2935> and go <WH1980> to the place <WH4725> where <WH834> <WH8033> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> chooses <WH977> to establish <WH7931> His name. <WH8034>

"And you shall go <WH935> to the priest <WH3548> who <WH834> is in office at that time, <WH3117> and say <WH559> to him, 'I declare <WH5046> this day <WH3117> to the Lord <WH3068> my God <WH430> that I have entered <WH935> the land <WH776> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> swore <WH7650> to our fathers to give <WH1> us.'
"Then the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> the basket <WH2935> from your hand <WH3027> and set <WH5117> it down <WH5117> before <WH6440> the altar <WH4196> of the Lord <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

"And you shall answer <WH6030> and say <WH559> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> 'My father was a wandering Aramean, <WH1> and he went <WH6> down <WH761> to Egypt <WH3381> and sojourned <WH3381> there, <WH4714> few <WH1481> in number; <WH8033> but there <WH4592> he became <WH4962> a great, <WH8033> mighty <WH1961> and populous <WH1419> nation. <WH6099>
'And the Egyptians <WH4713> treated <WH7489> us harshly <WH7489> and afflicted <WH6031> us, and imposed <WH5414> hard <WH7186> labor <WH5656> on us.

'Then we cried <WH6817> to the Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of our fathers, and the Lord <WH1> heard <WH3068> our voice <WH8085> and saw <WH6963> our affliction <WH7200> and our toil <WH6040> and our oppression; <WH5999>

and the Lord <WH3068> brought <WH3318> us out of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027> and an outstretched <WH5186> arm <WH2220> and with great <WH1419> terror <WH4172> and with signs <WH226> and wonders; <WH4159>
and He has brought <WH935> us to this <WH2088> place, <WH4725> and has given <WH5414> us this <WH2088> land, <WH776> a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey. <WH1706>

'And now <WH6258> behold, <WH2009> I have brought <WH935> the first <WH7225> of the produce <WH6529> of the ground <WH127> which <WH834> Thou, O Lord <WH3068> hast given <WH5414> me.' And you shall set <WH5117> it down <WH5117> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and worship <WH7812> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God; <WH430>

and you and the Levite <WH3881> and the alien <WH1616> who <WH834> is among <WH7130> you shall rejoice <WH8055> in all <WH3605> the good <WH9185> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> has given <WH5414> you and your household. <WH1004>

"When <WH3588> you have finished <WH3615> paying <WH6237> all <WH3605> the tithe <WH4643> of your increase <WH8393> in the third <WH7992> year, <WH8141> the year <WH8141> of tithing, <WH4643> then you shall give <WH5414> it to the Levite, <WH3881> to the stranger, <WH1616> to the orphan <WH3490> and to the widow, <WH490> that they may eat <WH398> in your towns, <WH8179> and be satisfied. <WH7646>

"And you shall say <WH559> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> 'I have removed <WH1197> the sacred <WH6944> [portion] from [my] house, <WH1004> and also <WH1571> have given <WH5414> it to the Levite <WH3881> and the alien, <WH1616> the orphan <WH3490> and the widow, <WH490> according to all <WH3605> Thy commandments <WH4687> which <WH834> Thou hast commanded <WH6680> me; I have not transgressed <WH5674> or forgotten <WH7911> any <WH4480> of Thy commandments. <WH4687>

'I have not eaten <WH398> of it while mourning, <WH205> nor <WH3808> have I removed <WH1197> any <WH4480> of it while I was unclean, <WH2931> nor <WH3808> offered <WH5414> any <WH4480> of it to the dead. <WH4191> I have listened <WH8085> to the voice <WH6963> of the Lord <WH3068> my God; <WH430> I have done <WH6213> according to all <WH3605> that Thou hast commanded <WH6680> me.

'Look <WH8259> down <WH8259> from Thy holy <WH6944> habitation, <WH4583> from heaven, <WH8064> and bless <WH1288> Thy people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> and the ground <WH127> which <WH834> Thou hast given <WH5414> us, a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey, <WH1706> as Thou didst swear <WH7650> to our fathers.'

"This <WH2088> day <WH3117> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> commands <WH6680> you to do <WH6213> these <WH428> statutes <WH2706> and ordinances. <WH4941> You shall therefore be careful <WH8104> to do <WH6213> them with all <WH3605> your heart <WH3824> and with all <WH3605> your soul. <WH5315>

"You have today <WH3117> declared <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> to be your God, <WH430> and that you would walk <WH1980> in His ways <WH1870> and keep <WH8104> His statutes, <WH2706> His commandments <WH4687> and His ordinances, <WH4941> and listen <WH8085> to His voice. <WH6963>

"And the Lord <WH3068> has today <WH3117> declared <WH559> you to be His people, <WH5971> a treasured <WH5459> possession, <WH5459> as He promised <WH1696> you, and that you should keep <WH8104> all <WH3605> His commandments; <WH4687>

and that He shall set <WH5414> you high <WH5945> above <WH5921> all <WH3605> nations <WH1471> which <WH834> He has made, <WH6213> for praise, <WH8416> fame, <WH8034> and honor; <WH8597> and that you shall be a consecrated <WH6918> people <WH5971> to the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> as He has spoken. <WH1696> "
